preclusion: Students admitted into the Pharm Sci major and Pharm Sci minor programmes.
description: This module builds on the concepts introduced in PR1150 Professional Identity Development I. In this module, students will continue to explore and experience what professionalism and ethics mean to pharmacists in practice. To develop stronger identity to the profession, an overarching introduction to the various challenges facing the Singaporeâ€™s healthcare system will be conducted to provide a broader perspective to healthcare. In order to effect change, students will be gradually cultivated to fill leadership roles for future. Lastly, more legislative components regarding the practice of pharmacy in Singapore will be built upon what was imparted in PR1150.
title: Professional Identity Development II
